name: Rules by supreme court
text:
The supreme court may from time to time, by general rules, prescribe forms for carrying section 604-13 into effect, and make all other needful regulations. [L 1868, p 21; RL 1925, §2282; RL 1935, §3772; RL 1945, §9682; RL 1955, §216-13; HRS ]
Revision Note
  Reference to repealed §604-14, deleted.
Cross References
  Other provisions for rules, see §602-11.
